channel.title: Hey in my Testscape folder, the admin and mod txt folders ain't there plzhelp!
channel.description: :( I can't make anyone mod or admin becuz the admin and mod txt files aren't there! can u tell me where to find them?:)

item.title: Hey in my Testscape folder, the admin and mod txt folders ain't there plzhelp!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

STOP POSTING THIS IN AVERY SINGLE THREAD. I WILL REPORT IT TO A MODERATOR IF YOU CONTINUE! :mad:

item.source: Hey in my Testscape folder, the admin and mod txt folders ain't there plzhelp!

item.title: Hey in my Testscape folder, the admin and mod txt folders ain't there plzhelp!
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Open client.java

press ctrl + f and search /admin

go down and In between the “” add whatever the name of the admin/mod is

3 = owner Can’t see crown but others can (gold)
2 = admin All can see crown (gold)
1 = mod All can see crown (silver)

Read full topic
